attributes.action: uphold the government's promise that children should have the right to a free education all over the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently 75 million children in the world do not have access to primary education. Here at Paignton Community and Sports College we feel this is unacceptable. We are petitioning the government to uphold the promises that it has already made.
